Class Date

java.lang.Object
scs3grp5.entity.Date

public class Date extends Object implements Comparable<Date>, Serializable
A Date object used to represent a date.

      Parameters:
      year - The year of the date (e.g. 2023)
      month - The month of the date in numbers (1-12)
      dayOfMonth - The day of the month (1-31)
      Throws:
      DateTimeException - When given arguments cannot form a valid date
